title: '[PARSER] Platform Name'

## Platform name
Which AI platform should be supported?

## Export availability
- Can users export their data from this platform?
- What format does it use (JSON, CSV, etc.)?
- How do users access/download their exports?

## Sample data
Can you provide a sanitized sample export file?

**Important:** Remove all personal information, usernames, emails, and sensitive content before sharing.

You can attach a file or link to a Gist.

## Documentation
Links to official documentation about the export format (if available):

## Motivation
Why is this platform important to support?

## Additional context
Anything else we should know about this platform's data format?
